slide.title: eZ Components' Search component
slide.subtitle: Indexing
slide.example:
<?php
$session = new ezcSearchSession( 
	$backend, 
	new ezcSearchXmlManager( $testFilesDir ) 
);

$a = new Article(
	null, // id
	'Test Article', // title 
	'This is an article to test', // description
	'the body of the article', // body
	time() // published
);
$session->index( $a );
?>
